sqlMap.select: select a.*, c.name as categoryName from article a left join category c on a.categoryId = c.id
sqlMap.insert: insert into article(title, content, userId, categoryId) values (#title#, #content#, #userId#, #categoryId#)
sqlMap.select: select a.*, c.name as categoryName from article a left join category c on a.categoryId = c.id where a.id = #id# and a.status != -1
